title: Executive Assistant - Credit Specialist ( Urgent Hiring! )
job_overview:
We are conducting interviews this week, if you're a hard worker and want to be a part of a world-class team and make an impact be sure to apply!

Credit Specialist | Legacy Strong | $500+ / mo Upside | REMOTE

I’m Alec Delpuech, the founder of Legacy Strong, a B2B accelerator that has worked with over 50 clients in the past year.

We’re on the hunt for a Credit Specialist to help take us to 15 new clients per month.

Legacy Strong is a company that helps entrepreneurs and small businesses secure funding through bank financing. We are currently seeking a dynamic and self-motivated Credit Specialist to join our remote team.

More details:
- Looking for a a dynamic and self-motivated individual with a strong understanding of the American credit system.
- Work with the Credit Repair Cloud software and remove negative items on client credit reports.
- Reporting to CEO.

Selling Points:
- Unique opportunity to help build a company from 50 clients to 1000 in just a few years.
- We have a “Conscious Culture:”: there is an incredible balance of world-class standards & intensity while promoting a healthy lifestyle. An extremely fun and empowering environment to be in.

Requirements:
- Excellent English speaking and writing
- Minimum 1 year experience working in the American credit repair industry
- Experience in using Credit Repair Cloud software
- Strong decision-making skills
- High emotional intelligence, resilience, and problem-solving ability
- Comfortable speaking over the phone and answering questions
- Good organization skills

How to apply:
- Attach resume
- Input "Golden Doodle" in the application subject line

------------

If this seems interesting, please apply!
Looking forward to connecting!


Alec Delpuech
Legacy Strong
